'''Master Player Badge''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the {{Quest|Ascension Challenge III}}.

It replaces [[Expert Player Badge]] and upon completing {{Quest|Ascension Challenge IV}} is itself replaced by [[Legend Player Badge]].
